an7.74:1.1: Was he a Jain? https://www.academia.edu/35616096/Jain_Shade_in_Early_Buddhism_with_reference_to_the_Araka_Sutta_in_the_A%E1%B9%85guttara_Nik%C4%81ya He may be the Adraka of Isibhasiyam https://archive.org/details/in.ernet.dli.2015.322298/page/115/mode/2up https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aranatha
an7.74:1.4: The vocative _brāhmaṇa_ is singular, but i must be used in a plural sense. The online BJT edition has _brāhmaṇā_.
